txt.en: Return to Bráthi with the gold that you have collected
Bráthi can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset.\n\nYou should return to Bráthi with the gold nuggets that you have collected.

'I am in search of a rare treasure of Gundabad. I believe many have been collected by the beasts that reside in the mountains here. Would you be able to collect gold nuggets that were mined by dwarves in Gundabad long ago?'
Bráthi the Master Prospector is in search of rare treasures in Gundabad.
Gold nuggets may be found on beasts throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should collect gold nuggets for Bráthi.
'Thank you! These gold nuggets are quite valuable and will assist the dwarves greatly! What wonders are in Gundabad!'
